timeline.bodyText: @g4s8 It's better to use Concatenation here and create the String only when all bytes are read. ByteBuffer can ends at the middle of UTF-8 char (let's assume that buffer size = 4. When you try to read 1фыв2, byte buffer will read 1ф and the first byte of ы. It causes the resulted string will be like 1ф??в2)
timeline.author: brastak

timeline.bodyText: @g4s8 The same issue - create the string after reading all bytes
